name: Excerpts of Bliss
desc: Pages found while exploring Simulanka. They contain text fragments that describe the daily lives of the realm's inhabitants. Filled as they are with leisure and joy, they set outsiders at ease, that they too may enjoy unforgettable and happy times with their companions in this marvelous wonderland.

value.text: Version 4.8 Event - Summertide Scales and Tales

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.desc:

"I had a very, very long dream..."

customize.name: Jocund Letters
customize.desc:
Letter paper emanating a faint magical glow, and a finely crafted quill. With this in hand, elegant, ebullient words shall flow across the page of their own accord, writing detailed descriptions of certain objects' locations, and seemingly hinting at the location of treasure...
After using this item, you can detect "Excerpts of Bliss" within a certain AoE inside Simulanka.

customize.name: Phantom in Boots
customize.desc: Kirara's outfit. The swashbuckling feline of fairytale fame, the crafty courier of dearly-held dreams... is pleased to make your acquaintance!

These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.
Material that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

customize.name: Joyous Letters
customize.desc:
Letter paper that radiates a magical glow, and a masterfully crafted quill. With this in hand, elegant, ebullient words shall flow across the page of their own accord, writing detailed descriptions of certain objects' locations, and seemingly hinting at the location of treasure...
After using this item, you can detect all "Excerpts of Bliss" within Simulanka.
